title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to portions of a new book detailing the break up between Tom Brady and Bill Belichick and why we shouldn’t be surprised their dynasty came to an unceremonious end. He wonders if the Cowboys have the right head coach in Mike McCarthy to lead them to a Super Bowl with Dak Prescott at quarterback. Plus, Fox Sports College Football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to explain why Mario Cristobal should consider the USC head coaching position.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
